name: RF Jamming Demo Timeline
description: Demonstration scenario for RF jamming capabilities

content.title: Demo Started
content.message: RF Jamming demonstration initiated. GQRX should be connected to localhost:1234 showing the spectrum waterfall.

content.title: System Ready
content.message: IQ file playback active. Use the RF Control dashboard to demonstrate different jamming techniques.

content.title: Demo Checkpoint
content.message: Demonstrate spot jamming: Enable jamming and adjust power to show signal interference in GQRX.
